Main":"#ed8440","Hamburg":"#3863a0","London":"#a2cc3e","Munich":"#cc5068","Orlando":"#73427f","Paris":"#1e93c6","Prague":"#f2b827","Rīga":"#d6563c","Stockholm":"#6a5c9e","Sydney":"#31a35f","Vienna":"#ed8440","Vilnius":"#3863a0","Warsaw":"#a2cc3e","Zurich":"#cc5068"}","gridLinesX.showMajorLines":true,"axisY.abbreviation":"auto","legend.mode":"seriesCompare","fieldDashStyles":"{"Austin":"solid","Berlin":"solid","Bonn":"solid","Brussels":"solid","Copenhagen":"solid","Frankfurt am Main":"solid","Hamburg":"solid","London":"solid","Munich":"solid","Orlando":"solid","Paris":"solid","Prague":"solid","Rīga":"solid","Stockholm":"solid","Sydney":"solid","Vienna":"solid","Vilnius":"solid","Warsaw":"solid","Zurich":"solid"}","displayView":"analytics_workspace"},"dataSources":{"primary":"search_6"},"title":"weather.WindDirection","description":""}},"dataSources":{"search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("weather.Temperature") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_mweather" span=30m BY name
| timechart avg("weather.Temperature") span=30m useother=false BY name WHERE max in top20
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("weather.Humidity") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_mweather" span=30m BY name
| timechart avg("weather.Humidity") span=30m useother=false BY name WHERE max in top5
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("weather.Pressure") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_mweather" span=30m BY name
| timechart avg("weather.Pressure") span=30m useother=false BY name WHERE max in top20
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("weather.Visibility") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_mweather" span=30m BY name
| timechart avg("weather.Visibility") span=30m useother=false BY name WHERE max in top20
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("weather.Windspeed") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_mweather" span=30m BY name
| timechart avg("weather.Windspeed") span=30m useother=false BY name WHERE max in top20
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"search_6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("weather.WindDirection") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_mweather" span=30m BY name
| timechart avg("weather.WindDirection") span=30m useother=false BY name WHERE max in top20
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":1500},"structure":[{"item":"chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":250,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":500,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_4","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":750,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_5","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":1000,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_6","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":1250,"w":1200,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"title":"Weather_Metrics_DS","description":"","inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Range","options":{"token":"global_time_tok","defaultValue":"-7d,now"}}}}
